alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 17 at 7:58PM EDT until May 19 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the beaches, Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the beaches, Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks, and Ocracoke Island. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island
